Name: Death To The Dragon Lord
About the game: For over a millennia the land of Aforn has been under the tyrannical rule of the Dragon Lord. All attempts to overthrow him have led to near genocide, but the Dragon Lord's cruelty is so great that despite the consequences another revolt is brewing. A revolt led by two souls who have lost everything to the Dragon Lord's senseless savagery. Will you be able to lead them to victory, or will Aforn forever remain under his brutal rule? A story rich experience with over a hundred cut scenes, Death To The Dragon Lord is a full length traditional JRPG which takes over 20 hours to complete. Strategy Guide with walk-through and maps now available in the game folder.
